mapper.select: SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, t.user_id AS userId, t.team_id AS teamId, tm.team_name AS teamName, t.content, t.start_date AS startDate, t.due_date AS dueDate, t.completed_at IS NOT NULL AS isCompleted FROM todos t JOIN team tm ON t.team_id = tm.team_id WHERE t.todo_id = #{todoId} AND t.user_id = #{userId}
